summary: Provides a comprehensive test suite for the Hunyuan DiT ControlNet image generation pipeline, covering quick sanity checks (component initialization, inference consistency, batch handling, optional model serialization, and CPU offload) and extensive integration tests that validate the pipeline across various conditioning inputs such as edge maps, depth maps, and pose signals.
business_intent: Guarantee the stability, correctness, and performance of the ControlNet-based image generation system before deployment, enabling early detection of regressions and confirming support for multiple conditioning modalities.
